entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:04 p.m. EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
